Html:
Hello
I am doing a package of Flash Player Active X and I don't want that that update appears in clients with Windows 8. When I create the update in WPP, in rules I add a new rule - windows version - less than 8. I publish the update and IT STILL APPEARS in clients with Windows 8. What am i doing wrong? Should I active "reverse rule" or "delete rule from package level" in one case?

Thanks in advanced
If you publish AdobeFlashPlayer.MSI, you need to know that these files came with their own rules. So if you want to make your own rules, you need to active the option "Delete rule at package level".
Its working! The problem is solved! Thanks
